name: Ride on time transportation
overview:
Ride on Time Transportation $39 for Chauffeured Drive to Logan Airport ($138 value)

Ensuring customers are on time and budget Transportation details confirmed constantly Experience professionals working 24/7 Highest level of luxury service & satisfaction Suburban SUVs also available Groups of 4-7 in Lincoln Town Car to Logan This voucher can be used up until Jan 15, 2014 Limit 3 vouchers per customer. Each voucher must be used by a separate individual. Additional fee of $3.50/mile fee applies more than 15 miles outside 02108. All fees and tolls not included. Infant and toddler car seats not included. Pickup from airport not included. Appointments are required and subject to availability. Merchant cancellation/re-scheduling policy of 24 hours applies; voucher subject to forfeiture. Voucher available for use immediately after purchase. The amount paid for the voucher does not expire. The remaining promotional value of the voucher above what you paid for it is valid through the voucher expiration date, and will expire immediately after such date.

THE OFFER

Ready for a luxury ride before your trip? Ride on Time Transportation is ready to deliver you in style to Logan airport in one of our spacious, luxurious Lincoln Town cars. Prompt chauffeurs will whisk groups of four to seven passengers to Logan airport in comfort, safety, and style. Want more space? Ride on Time also has a suite of Suburban SUV’s that are equipped with all of the latest luxury gadgets to keep you and your family amused on the way to the airport. Ride on Time is ready for you.
